${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you change the constructor of your card to use super(cardInfo, true); this will be the card's description when it is upgraded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:BlindRage.NAME: Blind Rage
${modID}:BlindRage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! copies of *Dazed to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Fury.NAME: Fury
${modID}:Fury.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have no Block, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
${modID}:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you may Exhaust up to !M! card(s) in your hand.

${modID}:IronWill.NAME: Iron Will
${modID}:IronWill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust all Curses and Statuses in your hand.

${modID}:Dominate.NAME: Dominate
${modID}:Dominate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Vulnerable, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:Reinforce.NAME: Reinforce
${modID}:Reinforce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat.

${modID}:TheBestDefense.NAME: The Best Defense
${modID}:TheBestDefense.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, gain !B! Block.
